tosdr.case: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them

title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them
quoteText: The Society may, in its sole discretion, utilize, in any manner the Society deems appropriate, all comments and suggestions, whether written or oral, furnished by any Course User to the Society in connection with Educational Opportunities (“Feedback”). Course User assigns to the Society all right, title and interest, including, without limitation, all intellectual property rights, in and to the Feedback.
